title: THEMIS-A:  Solid State Telescope (SST): Energy Flux spectrogram:  Data includes: Electron/Ion Ground-Calculated Fluxes (30 keV - 300 keV). - V. Angelopoulos, D. Larson & R.P. Lin (UCB, NASA NAS5-02099)

info.contact: V. Angelopoulos, D. Larson & R.P. Lin @ UCB, NASA NAS5-02099

parameters.name: tha_pseb_data_quality
parameters.description: SST Burst Mode Electron Moment Data Quality (0: Good data, non-zero: Data may not be suitable, see: http://themis.ssl.berkeley.edu/sst_flag.shtml.)

parameters.name: tha_pseb_en_efluxQ
parameters.description: SST Electron energy spectrogram(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['tha_pseb_en_eflux', 'tha_pseb_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: SST Electron energy spectrogram(Good data only)

parameters.name: tha_pseb_densityQ
parameters.description: SST burst mode derived electron density(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['tha_pseb_density', 'tha_pseb_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: tha_pseb_avgtempQ
parameters.description: SST burst mode derived average electron temperature(Good data only). Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: tha_pseb_vthermalQ

Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: tha_pseb_sc_potQ
parameters.description: Spacecraft potential used in generation of tha_pseb moments(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['tha_pseb_sc_pot', 'tha_pseb_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: tha_pseb_t3Q
parameters.description: SST burst mode electron diagonalized temperature (Tprp1, Tprp2, Tpar)(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['tha_pseb_t3', 'tha_pseb_data_quality']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Electron Diagonalized Temperature(Tprp1, Tprp2, Tpar)(Good data only)

parameters.name: tha_pseb_magt3Q
parameters.description: SST burst mode electron temperature temperature magnetic field aligned. (Tprp1FA, Tprp2FA, TparFA)(Good data only). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function apply_esa_qflag (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['tha_pseb_magt3', 'tha_pseb_data_quality']. parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: Electron Temperature, Field Aligned(Tprp1FA, Tprp2FA, TparFA) (Good data only)
